entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of showers. Low 14. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of showers early this evening with risk of a thunderstorm. Wind southeast 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 this evening then becoming light before morning. Low 14. Forecast issued 6:43 PM MDT Wednesday 3 May 2023
